author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

* Add new MutableMemberChecker to test for modifying `mutable` member variable inside `const` member function (directly via assignment or indirectly via calling non-const member function of that mutable member)
* Add new UnnecessaryMutableCheker to report "unnecessary mutables - i.e. mutables that are not modified in any `const` method.
* Rename MutableMemberChecker to PublicMutableChecker and only look for `mutable` member variables with non-`private` access modifier
* Remove old files, add script to test llvm analyzer using files in `test` directory
* Treat files with invalid path ("temporary files... or modified after launching clang") as not belonging to CMSSW

#### PR validation:

Bot tests + `run_static_checks.sh` in local project
title: Update CMS LLVM Analyzers
